message: I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product for $100. It's a rare find, and I'm confident you'll love it. I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased this product, and I'm sure you'll be thrilled with your purchase. What do you say? Will you take it home today?
I'm willing to take the product, but I'll only pay $80 for it. I'm hoping it's really high-quality, but I'm also prepared to walk away if it's not.
